name: Flying Squad, Attack!
title: Flying Squad, Attack!
desc: "Back when the Flower-Feather Clan was responsible for patrolling and defending all of Natlan, the flying squad was the best of the best â€” the fiercest warriors in the nation."

skills.desc:
Randomly Discard up to 2 cards from your hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost, then draw cards until there are 4 cards in your Hand.
After you Discard this card from your Hand: Draw 1 card.
